title: Proper Cross-Validation
description: This is my implementation of the CV procedure as I understand it should be based on the forum discussion. The idea is to make sure that all 6 clips from a particular hour are either all in train or all in test set. The script expects input data a pandas dataframe with the following columns:  patient (patient number i.e. 1, 2 or 3) segment (based on the filename) outcome (the class i.e. 0 or 1 for interictal and preictal) sequence (the sequence number found in the source file) all other features generated for each file
description_lemmatized: implementation cv procedure understand based forum discussion idea make sure 6 clip particular hour either train test set script expects input data panda dataframe following column patient patient number ie 1 2 3 segment based filename outcome class ie 0 1 interictal preictal sequence sequence number found source file feature generated file
